content: UH 700 Hammer drill Corded two-speed, high-torque hammer drill driver for universal use ### Categories: Home > Products > Power tools > Drill drivers and screwdrivers- - - ### FEATURES:Features Ergonomically designed pistol grip and low weight for maximum comfort during long periods of use Very reliable thanks to the extremely rugged casing and robust motor Stepless electronic speed control for smooth, gentle starting and screwdriving Two gears plus additional hammering function for a wide range of applications Choice of keyless chuck with spindle lock or robust key chuck Applications Hammer drilling in masonry and natural stone Rotary drilling in steel and sheet metal Rotary drilling and hole sawing in soft and hard woods Various screwdriving jobs Drilling large-diameter holes in wood ### TECHNICAL DATA:Chuck clamping range: 1/16 - 1/2 inNo load RPM: gear 1: 900 rpm; gear 2: 2500 rpmMaximum torque (Soft / Hard Joint): 708 in-lb (soft joint) Technical Data | Chuck clamping range | 1/16 - 1/2 in | No load RPM | gear 1: 900 rpm; gear 2: 2500 rpm | Maximum torque (Soft / Hard Joint) | 708 in-lb (soft joint) | Number of gears | 2 | Dimensions (LxWxH) | 13.5 x 3.4 x 8.1 in | Weight | 5.73 lb | Triaxial vibration value for drilling into metal (ah,D) | 2.5 m/sÂ² | 1 | Rated input voltage | 120 V | Chuck type | Pistol-grip, Quick-release chuck 13 mm | According to the applicable product standard (see Operating Instruction for more details) ### ITEMS- 273745 - Universal hammer drill keyed UH 700 - Package Size 1 pc Package Contents: - 1x UH 700 120V USA ZKR Hammer drill - 1x DUST COVER (REPAIR PART) - 1x UH 700 Tool case assy
